name: Subject #26
description:
Introduction

Zele has been trapped in the same room for years, kept company only by a voice she calls "Mother." But an unexpected visitor is about to reveal the secrets behind Zele's captivity.

Created for Narrative Driven Jam 2.

Controls

Use the arrow keys to move.
Press Z to interact with objects and advance text. (NOTE: if playing on mobile or any other PICO-8 platform, either (X) or (O) will work.)
